title: Bowl
provenance: Delomosne and Son, Ltd., London; 1963 P. Warren, NY
description: Drum-shaped bowl with scalloped edge, the base tapering to a flat bottom, tall stem with central knop, wide flat circular base cut on the bottom with raised flutes; sides of bowl cut with facets at the bottom, bands of prismatic cutting and small diamonds above, a wide band of interlocking loops surrounded by small diamonds and fan cutting.
name: Bowl
